managements.title: Nerve compression
managements.description: A condition where nerves are compressed or pinched, often causing pain, numbness, or weakness in the affected area.

managements.title: Myelopathy
managements.description: A disorder of the spinal cord caused by compression or damage, leading to neurological symptoms and functional impairment.

managements.title: Cervical spine surgery
managements.description: Surgical procedures performed on the cervical (neck) region of the spine to address various conditions and restore function.

managements.title: Lumbar spine surgery
managements.description: Surgical interventions targeting the lumbar (lower back) region to treat pain, instability, and other spinal conditions.

managements.title: Thoracic spine surgery
managements.description: Specialized surgical procedures for the thoracic (mid-back) spine region, addressing complex conditions and deformities.

managements.title: Scoliosis, Kyphosis, and Spinal Deformity
managements.description: Comprehensive treatment for spinal curvature disorders including scoliosis, kyphosis, and other complex spinal deformities.

managements.title: Radiculopathy - Sciatica
managements.description: Treatment for radiculopathy and sciatica, conditions involving nerve root compression causing pain, tingling, and weakness along the nerve pathway.

managements.title: Same day surgery
managements.description: Advanced minimally invasive surgical procedures that allow patients to return home on the same day as their surgery.
